text: Mu by’ukuri ubuzima bw’isi bugereranywa nk’amazi (imvura) twamanuye mu kirere, akameza ibimera byo ku isi biribwa n’abantu n’amatungo, kugeza ubwo isi itoshye ibereye amaso, maze abayituye bakibwira ko bayigenga, nuko ikagerwaho n’itegeko ryacu (ryo kurimbura ibiyiriho), haba mu ijoro cyangwa ku manywa, maze tukabigira nk’ibyarandaguwe ndetse nk’aho bitari bihari umunsi wa mbere yaho. Uko ni ko dusobanura ibimenyetso ku bantu batekereza
